name: SketchBoarder
description:
SketchBoarder is a puzzle game where player is not controlling the character but the path for the character itself.

In this game, player can only draw one continuous path for the character to reach the finish. You need to collect the stars too! Solve all the levels and get good!

SketchBoarder is our project for the IGSI-GameJam-2022, which given the theme "You control the environment, not the player"

Developed by:

Millen Dhita

Luky Andreas

Sesarius Mahendra
